participant_1.background:
I wake up early, feed my cats, and read my favorite comic books before I start blogging.
I love that my job allows me to help animals in need.
i am obsessed with my dog.
my desire is to becom a fashion designer.
I remember getting teased about my freckles when I was a kid, but I've grown to love them.

participant_2.background:
I'm a big animal lover and do what I can to help them in my free time.
every fall i visit my sister in canada.
I'm a big guy with a big heart, and I love my family and my culture.
i have 23 cats at home.
i have been married 3 times.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a big animal lover too. I have 2 cats and a dog.
How sweet! I have 23 cats at home!
Wow, that's a lot of cats! I bet you have your hands full.
Yes, but I love them all. They're my family.
That's so sweet. I'm glad you have such a loving home for them.
Thank you. What kind of cats do you have?
I have a tabby cat and a black cat.
I have a lot of different kinds of cats. I have a tabby, a Persian, a Siamese, and a couple of mutts.
That sounds amazing. I love seeing all the different kinds of cats.
Me too. They're all so unique and special.
I agree. I think cats are the best animals.
I can't disagree with you there. I love cats more than anything.
What do you like most about cats?
I love their independent nature. They're not always clingy like dogs.
That's true. I like that they can entertain themselves for hours.
Me too. I love watching them play.
